rpc.util
Class UnitUtil

java.lang.Object
  rpc.util.UnitUtil

public class UnitUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides methods to process and retrieve units.

mapItemNames

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> mapItemNames(Unit unit)
Get a list of unique names of tables (with suffixes for multiple appearances) from the paths in a unit to be used as the FROM clause in a SQL query.

Parameters:
unit - the unit from which to process the list of schema items.
Returns:
a list of unique names of tables.

getUnits

public static java.util.List<Unit> getUnits(int HOP_THRESHOLD)
Get the list of all units given a specific hop threshold to use in the schema.

Parameters:
HOP_THRESHOLD - the maximum number of hops in each path.
Returns:
the list of all units.

getUniqueUnits

public static java.util.List<Unit> getUniqueUnits(int HOP_THRESHOLD)
Get the list of all unique units corresponding to dependencies (having a singleton outcome) given a specific hop threshold to use in the schema.

Parameters:
HOP_THRESHOLD - the maximum number of hops in each path.
Returns:
the list of all unique units.

getRelationshipsOnUnit

public static java.util.Set<Vertex> getRelationshipsOnUnit(Unit u)
Get all relationships as vertices (excluding the base and treatment if structural) that appear on the treatment path of a unit.

Parameters:
u - the unit.
Returns:
the set of vertices corresponding to the relationships that appear along the treatment path in a unit.

getRelationshipPathsOnUnit

public static java.util.Set<Path> getRelationshipPathsOnUnit(Unit u)
Get all relationships as singleton path objects (excluding the base and treatment if structural) that appear on the treatment path of a unit.

Parameters:
u - the unit.
Returns:
the set of singleton relationship paths that appear along the treatment path in a unit.
